text.content: Listen  Listen to the summer sound  You're fine    What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want    Let me  Let me take you by the hand  To the  To the promised wonder land    What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want  What you need is what you want
